title: Two-colour separation studies
brief_description: A variety of still life, landscape and portrait studies in both red/green and orange/blue systems are accompanied by a detailed explanation by Arthur Cantrill of the process and history of the two colour separation system. Includes a simulation of the Kinemacolour process which alternated red and green frames.
